alert.note: Alert for Chippewa; Rusk (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 15 at 9:10PM CST until December 15 at 10:00PM CST by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Twin Cities has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Rusk County in northwestern Wisconsin... Chippewa County in west central Wisconsin... * Until 1000 PM CST. * At 910 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near New Auburn to 6 miles northwest of Cadott to 7 miles northeast of Fairchild, moving northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Cornell around 920 PM CST. Weyerhaeuser around 925 PM CST. Bruce and Sheldon around 930 PM CST. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Hawkins. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CST for northwestern and west central Wisconsin. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CST for northwestern and west central Wisconsin.
